attributes.action: Rail Link £32b HS2 Good Idea but cost will end up £64b as always Govt project are late & cost will double.
attributes.additional_details:
New rail is good idea, however all project (by Govt) is always over run the cost and deliverd late.  The point I want to make,  all the contract and jobs must go to British worker, British Comapnies, or  is it going aborad just like Bombardier!   Please sign this petition so the Govt make sure British comapnies and people come first.

Many thanks
